name: Debapriya Basu Roy
content: Home | Research top of page This website was built on Wix. Create yours today.Get StartedHelloA Bit About MeI am Debapriya, currently working as an assistant professor at IIT Kanpur. I did my PhD under Prof. Debdeep Mukhopadhyay at IIT Kharagpur and after that did my postdoctoral fellowship at Technical University of Munich under Prof. Georg Sigl. My research interest includes applied cryptography, hardware security, post quantum cryptography etc. I have expertise on developing hardware accelerators for cryptography and side channel analysis.Research AwardsCoursesbottom of page
